___type.description: Client type, either http, tchannel or custom

___idlFile.description: Path to client thrift file, relative to idl path

___exposedMethods.description: The thrift methods exposed on the client in Go, key is method name in Go, value is thrift method in form of service::method

___scenarios.description: Fixture scenarios, key is client method name, value is a list of string indicating different scenarios

___importPath.description: Package import path for concrete fixtures

___idlFileSha.description: Sha of the thrift file, reserved but currently not used

items.description: Name of the client this client depends on
